name: TransferGithubRepository
description:
Initiate the transfer of a GitHub repository to a new owner.

This tool starts the process of transferring a GitHub repository to another user. The new owner must accept the transfer when moving a personal repository. The response provides information about the original owner and continues the transfer asynchronously. For more details, refer to GitHub's documentation on repository transfers.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. Case insensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository to be transferred. Case-insensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: new_owner_username_or_org
parameters.description: The username or organization name to which the repository will be transferred.

value_schema.description: The username or organization name the repository will be transferred to.

parameters.name: new_repository_name
parameters.description: The new name to be given to the repository. It should be a valid GitHub repository name.

value_schema.description: The new name to be given to the repository.

parameters.name: team_ids_to_add
parameters.description: List of team IDs to add to the repository. Applicable only for organization-owned repositories.

value_schema.description: ID of the team or teams to add to the repository. Teams can only be added to organization-owned repositories.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: new_name
parameters.description: The new name to be given to the repository.

value_schema.description: The new name to be given to the repository.

parameters.name: new_owner
parameters.description: The username or organization name the repository will be transferred to.

value_schema.description: The username or organization name the repository will be transferred to.

parameters.name: team_ids
parameters.description: ID of the team or teams to add to the repository. Teams can only be added to organization-owned repositories.

value_schema.description: ID of the team or teams to add to the repository. Teams can only be added to organization-owned repositories.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
